# Support & Help

## 💡 Need Help?

If you have questions about using this package:

- **Check the README.md** for installation and usage.
- **Browse GitHub Issues** to see if your question has been answered.
- **Ask the Community**: Open a **Discussion** on GitHub.

## 🛠 Bug Reports

If you encounter a bug, please submit a **Bug Report** under [Issues](../../issues).

## 🎯 Feature Requests

If you have an idea for improvement, submit a **Feature Request**.

## ⚠️ Security Issues

**DO NOT** report security vulnerabilities publicly.  
Instead, **email us** at **uxmansrwr@gmail.com**.
